name: Des Sheridan
bio: Des founded Sheridan’s Pharmacy with a simple goal: provide clear, trustworthy healthcare advice in a welcoming local setting. He believes strongly in patient-first care and taking the time to explain things properly.

name: Nicole Bharaj
bio: Nicole oversees the day-to-day running of the shop, making sure everything from stock levels to customer service runs smoothly. She’s known for her calm approach and attention to detail.

name: Monica Walsh
bio: Monica focuses on team support and customer experience. She enjoys finding practical ways to improve workflows and ensure every customer interaction is a positive one.

name: Aisling O’Connor
bio: Aisling supports the dispensary with a strong focus on accuracy and efficiency. She plays a key role in keeping everything running safely behind the scenes.

name: Kieran Murphy
bio: Kieran is often the first point of contact in the shop. He enjoys helping customers find what they need quickly and explaining options in clear, simple terms.

name: Leah Hughes
bio: Leah helps customers choose skincare and wellness products that suit their needs and lifestyle. She focuses on simple routines and practical advice.

name: Patrick Nolan
bio: Patrick assists with local deliveries and customer queries, helping ensure people receive their medication and essentials on time.
